net.asrex.skillful.ui.actionbar

Class ActionBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • net.asrex.skillful.ui.actionbar.ActionBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PerkUI

    public class ActionBar
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
implements PerkUI
    An action bar is a simple perk UI that (like the vanilla action bar) allows players to select a single "active" perk from a list of available perks.

        public int getTotalWidth()
